about_the_game:
"Attack of the Worker" is a rogue-lite, pixel-style bullet shooting game where players experience the life of a worker in a tech company. They will face the challenges of work demands, programming issues, and battles with colleagues and bosses within the company. At the same time, they will explore their own story and uncover the hidden truths of the team.

Game features:
1. Unique enemy designs and level designs that represent common problems in China's tech industry, such as unreasonable overtime and forced assimilation into the collective. As the levels progress, the game explores the root causes of these issues.
2. The game combines weapons with passive effects and skills that consume the blue bar with active effects, adding depth and strategy to the combat.
3. Within the rogue-like structure, the game introduces a "hope" system and an "overtime" system, making the experience more realistic and giving the player more meaningful decisions to make.

I am sorry that the latest demo only has Chinese version, I didn't have enough time to do the localization. I promise that English version will come soon, please add to the wish list if you are interested in my game and have a little patience, thanks for your understanding :)
